page.title: 06Typical Valley Industry
page.content: MidGlam Packing Supplies is typical of small industries that we interviewed at the Nine Mile Point Industrial Estate.The manager informed us that his firm occupied Unit 30 in 1982 when regional grants were available,and because workers didn't need any special skills,there being only six people in the factory 2 of which were local.His industry was oil based,as polythene was extruded into whatever shape was required.He said that selling depended on finding people to buy his products in the larger towns and cities after much effort.The site was easily accessible,his only problem was cashflow as the industry cannot be helped anymore locally.We asked what he enjoyed about his job.He answered, "Being boss-but seriosly the satisfaction of selling my products." The least enjoyable,"Not selling!"
